title: 1 Bedroom w/ Fire Place, On Site Laundry,
posting_body: ['30 N Pearl St. managed by Cornerstone Apartments', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Ft.:', 'Price:', '$1395/mo.', 'Welcome to 30 N Pearl, a lovely property located conveniently in the Washington Park neighborhood of Denver.', 'This building is seated in a central location adjacent to the Denver Country Club near the Cherry Creek Shopping Center.', '30 N Pearl is in a bustling urban neighborhood just south of Downtown Denver and Capitol hill surrounded by local authentic restaurants, lively bars, and busy residential streets.', 'The West Washington Park Community Garden and Hungarian Freedom Park on Cherry Creek are great places to enjoy gardens, distant mountain views, and community spirit.', 'Local art galleries and small businesses are also walking distance from your new home at 30 N Pearl!', 'This building includes hardwood style flooring, on-site laundry, stainless steel appliances*, reserved parking*, and is dog and cat friendly!', 'Call our office today at', 'show contact info', 'or book a tour on our website today!', 'Features:', 'Wood Style Flooring', 'On-Site Laundry', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Contact us:', 'To schedule a showing please contact our leasing team at', 'To apply NOW please visit <URL>', 'Nearby Neighborhoods:', "Capitol Hill, City Park, Highlands, Platt Park, Baker, Congress Park, Uptown, Jefferson Park, University of Denver, RiNo, Five Points, Hale, Downtown, Sloan's Lake, West Wash Park, Cheesman Park, LoHi", 'Availability and pricing are subject to change.']
